testcase.name: theStepShouldExecuteSuccessfullyWithoutThrowingAnyErrors
testcase.system-out: the step should execute successfully without throwing any errors: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeExactlyOneOutputDocument
testcase.system-out: There should be exactly one output document: SUCCESS

testcase.name: TheOutputDocumentTheIntermediaryHTMLShouldHaveAnXmlbaseAttributeWithFilenameC00000Xhtml
testcase.system-out: The output document (the intermediary HTML) should have an xml:base attribute with filename C00000.xhtml: SUCCESS

testcase.name: TheOutputDocumentTheIntermediaryHTMLShouldHaveAnXmlbaseAttributePointingToTheTempdirDirectory
testcase.system-out: The output document (the intermediary HTML) should have an xml:base attribute pointing to the temp-dir directory: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeExactlyOneFilesetDocument
testcase.system-out: There should be exactly one fileset document: SUCCESS

testcase.name: TheFilesetShouldHaveAXmlbaseAttributePointingToTheTempdir
testcase.system-out: The fileset should have a xml:base attribute pointing to the temp-dir: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeAFileWithHref=C00000Xhtml

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeExactly8FilesInTheFileset

testcase.name: TheOutputDirectoryShouldExist

testcase.name: TheDefaultCSSFontsAndFontsLicenseShouldBeProvided

failure.message: The default CSS, fonts, and fonts license should be provided
